poemContent: Missiles falling, and killing the sinnersUkraine, Ukraine, sore losers,Mother Russia, die Mutterland, winners."Unleash the EDP into society" break them out of jail,Then look up into the sky, put up onehand STRAIGHT up into the air,and expect the nukes to hailHail 'OzyAndy, our früher, our Lord,pray for his detentions, and then sit there, Bored.Detention in class for bringing in tic tacks,Shoot this guy because he's black,blast the sky, 'till it's brown, full crap,Get an AK and bring it into die Stadtmitte, Snap,in the school and mow themDown.Then remember as their lives lie in your bloody hands,This was the war,and it all went to plan.Then remember as their lives lie in your bloody hands to this day.BLITZKRIEGBLITZKRIEGis all that remains.
